snippet: REICH--Samuel. March 5, 1920, Dubiecko, Poland, May 23, 2016, Morris Plains, NJ, husband of Bertha, father of Rachelle, Nathan, Helene, grandfather of Leonard, Daniel, Tamar, Jeremy, Elana, Nicole, Rebecca, Adina. He was an exceptionally gentle, kind, happy, generous man of the utmost integrity, loved and respected by all. He now joins brothers Zissa and Mendel, parents, Jonah and Rachella, who perished in the Holocaust and sister, Mina. Donations may be made to: Mt. Freedom Jewish Center, New Jersey. 1/3

He was an exceptionally gentle, kind, happy, generous man of the utmost integrity, loved and respected by all. He now joins brothers Zissa and Mendel, parents, Jonah and Rachella, who perished in the Holocaust and sister, Mina. Donations may be made to: Mt. Freedom Jewish Center, New Jersey. 1/3
